content.text: Cherokee Jack is Michael Scarn's trainer and mentor on the NHL All-star Games. He is played by Creed Bratton on The Office.

When Michael came to the stadium 3 days before the game for help to win a hockey game, Jack told Michael to mop the ice. Later, Michael quickly became one of the hottest hockey players in the country. Sometime after, Cherokee Jack died. When Michael was in the All-star game to get rid of the puck, Cherokee Jack's spirit appeared. He said, "I want you to take out all your frustrations, with women, the system, with everything. Take it out on the puck. All on the puck." This helped Michael shoot the puck out the stadium and land on Goldenface, played by Jim Halpert.
